dict.acceptation: “鉴于…”：正式文件的介绍性陈述，开场白；条件性陈述；

sent.orig: Occasionally, nodes will reveal only nonspecific lymphoid hyperplasia, whereas a neighboring node will harbor metastatic tumor.
sent.trans: 偶尔，淋巴结仅表现为非特异性淋巴组织增生，然而临近淋巴结隐匿恶性肿瘤。

sent.orig: You told me it was so,whereas as a matter of fact it is not so.
sent.trans: 你告诉我情况是那样，而事实上情况并非那样。

sent.orig: In partial moles, some villi (as seen atlower left) appear normal, whereas others are swollen.
sent.trans: 在部分胎块中，一些绒毛（左下所示）表现正常，然而它处绒毛肿胀。

sent.orig: He earns 8000 a year whereas she gets at least 20000.
sent.trans: 他一年挣8000英镑而她至少可获20000英镑。
